output_list.reason: Integer overflow in unprotected distribute function allows unauthorized access to tokens.
The transferFrom function allows attackers to steal assets due to incorrect reliance on the msg.sender address.
The mintToken function has an undefined owner, allowing unauthorized access to the contract.
The payWinner function does not check the user's identity, allowing unauthorized users to claim a prize.
The getEthBalance function does not check the user's address, allowing unauthorized users to retrieve personal information.
